website_summaries.verdict: The Zuli Smartplug is a versatile and creative product, offering features that are new to the market. Its current quality warrants the cost of entry, and coming updates only sweeten the deal.
pros: The Bluetooth Presence technology is precise, plus energy tracking, Nest integration, and dimming all make this a veritable Renaissance plug
cons: The lack of remote access is annoying, and Android compatibility and user sharing both need to be made available before this plug is a clear industry leader

customer_reviews.title: IOS User Do Not Purchase This
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. I downloaded the app for my iPhone, it worked well for a while. However, a few weeks ago it wouldn't allow me to turn the light on with the app. I got a new iPhone last week and tried to update the app and was told it was no longer in the app store. So now I have two plugs I can't use because I don't have the app. Junk to me now. If you use IOS DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Winton-Spearman

customer_reviews.title: Company Out of Business?
customer_reviews.text: Zuli App does not work. Looks like the company no longer exists. Do not buy these until you can confirm app is up and running otherwise the plugs won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Savine

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to give 5 stars and 0 stars at the same time
customer_reviews.text: It is such a shame. The product looks beautiful and is well designed, and the packaging is beautiful, too. It is one of the very few smart plug on the market that can also DIM- not just switch! BUT: the company seems to be out of business, only the iPhone app works (but even on the iPad it does not work properly). Most other apps do not know/ recognize the product/ don't support it. The ZULI app supports Nest and Philips Hue- but not the other way around. It uses Bluetooth, hence it requires your phone to be around. If you are away you cannot operate them- which really limits the application.
customer_reviews.author: jagxtreme

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this. Right off the bat, I could not even create an account. It kept giving an error without a hint as to what needs to be fixed. Changed user name, password, email - nothing happened. Still kept getting an error right on the app during setup. This is going back asap. By the way, it does not have one piece of paper with instructions as to how to use it. I have to say the packing was elaborate and fancy - much better than the device. Not one line on how to set it up. They really explain the proverb "do not judge a book by its cover".
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: They are total crap. They frequently lose programming, and even if you are a foot away, they will sometimes say you are out of Range. Now, they tell me I have connectivity issues, and I can’t control them. ( I have gig ethernet, and service, so it isn’t me). Don’t waste your money. We lost power last night, and as I keep getting the “connectivity “ message, I can’t program or operate them. They are now useless. Recommendations on a different brand?
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: No application available anymore
customer_reviews.text: They were working properly and couple of months I hade to stop using because I didn’t need them. Today, I tried to use again but the previously installed application didn’t reply. I deleted and tried to install again and oops... it’s not available anymore for IOS. So frustrated
customer_reviews.author: Bashir alsarhan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on these
customer_reviews.text: The app for these does not work. The last update was two years ago. Don’t waste your time with this brand, find another brand
customer_reviews.author: Maston

customer_reviews.title: No more support. Can’t download app.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. The company pulled the app from the App Store. No support. Won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install and works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was able to install these within minutes. Download the app and simply follow the instructions. These are not alexa enabled which is the only thing I regret, but they suffice my needs for christmas lights, setting a schedule, and controlling remotely. I also wish you could set multiple schedules, but you can only set one schedule per device. Some people mentioned they couldn't plug items into the second socket, but I have not experienced that issue. I am able to use the second socket to plug in other items. Overall, highly recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: No app available on Android or Apple to control plug.
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of time and effort with no app available to control it. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: PapaKilo

customer_reviews.title: Not WiFi, but Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Not connected by WiFi. Since I cannot connect through Wi-Fi at work, they are perfect for my office. They allow me to dim or make brighter as needed. They are connected by Bluetooth. You can set your presence so that the light goes on when you approach it. You determine when it goes on based on the 30 feet or so required for the Bluetooth to work. Mine work great, and I have six of them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Tyme

customer_reviews.title: The Zuli app has been delisted from Apple,
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! I now have three useless not so Smart Home Control plugs. If the product app no longer exist, they should return the $.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Do not buy. Check App Store.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 zuli Smart plugs and tonight I was told that the Zuli App no longer Exist. How do you expect me to use these smart turned dumb and stupid plugs? Waste of my money. Can I return these and exchange to something better if not refunded.
customer_reviews.author: R. R. ROSALES

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: I would personally recommend this. I use it for my hallway fan. It’s perfect if you want to turn on something without moving from your current position. Or, if you want to turn on a panini press, for example, or something that can be preheated, you can do that from your phone while watching tv or setting up whatever is to be cooked. Anyways, I’ve had much use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Ponthie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to configure
customer_reviews.text: I was anxious to try these, BUT I ended up returning them, for these reasons. On my phone, I could not set up my account, I kept getting "error" messages. When I tried on my computer, the browser message was that " Zuli.io " was not configured properly, to keep my information private. So I gave up (I'm not that tech savy) Maybe using a different browser might help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if it integrated with more Product apps and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and is fast when turning on and off a lamp, which I am using it for. Would be nice if it integrated with more Product apps and not just the Zuli App. I would give it a five if the product app would work better in Universal Smart Home Control Apps.
customer_reviews.author: Timc0203

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the app was removed from the App Store. Leaving me with no choice but to return it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work without the app. Unfortunately the app was removed from the App Store. Leaving me with no choice but to return it
customer_reviews.author: Big Reed

customer_reviews.title: Hung to dry
customer_reviews.text: I was going to use for my xmas tree. Before i open it i checked for the app on my android play store. The app couldn't be found. Now i have 3 smart plugs in an unopened box being unable to connect to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth collins

customer_reviews.title: For iPhone only
customer_reviews.text: The description did not say for iPhone only and that's what these are. I have not been able to use them and need to return them since I have a droid driven phone.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E. Blanda

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with Andriod. International customer service not available. No response to my email. A huge waste of money. Thinking of trying to sue. Certainly will be opening a IAG complaint.
customer_reviews.author: new grandmother

customer_reviews.title: OUT OF BUSINESS! WONT SYNC WITH ALEXA OR ANYTHING ELSE.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE FOR 10 Dollars!!!!! THE COMPANY IS OUT OF BUSINESS. You will not be able to get support. You will not be able to even sync these with the Zuli app. Or nest. Or Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very smart plug!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and allows me to dim a lamp which is not dimmable. How cool is that? It took me less than 5 minutes to open & install. I loved it so much I gave it to a friend. He had to reset the bluetooth to sync with his phone, which was easy once he figured it out. Note: You must have a dimmable lightbulb.
customer_reviews.author: peace&chickengrease

customer_reviews.title: Not for critical devices.
customer_reviews.text: I found, through experience, unfortunately, that with any power interruption, the Zuli stays off - which is a huge problem if you connect it to anything that you need on most of the time - an access point, router, freezer, heater, pump, etc. It may not be obvious to you that its off until disaster strikes hours or days later. Presence is simply not good when you have switches install on more than one floor - if you are standing above or below another switch, Zuli assumes that you are in the room.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Pass.
customer_reviews.text: Developers have stopped developing for this and it isn’t that great if a concept overall. Should have been Wifi and HomeKit enabled or some other service to work better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Bad Experience
customer_reviews.text: I bought the zuli smart plug a few months back , in the beginning they worked flawlessly and then started misbehaving . In the last 15 days they stopped working all together , I tried resetting but was not successful. I tried getting in touch with the support center , not successful , got a general email saying they will get back to me in a few days . In the meantime I have had to remove all the plugs . I don’t think this product will continue . Do not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: mihika

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what you get. Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Software doesn't work a lot of the time. Most of the time wont even talk to your phone via bluetooth. Thats all probably related to the poor program quality that has yet to be updated. If you don't wanna fight something don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for controlling electronics others would never turn off
customer_reviews.text: Great for controlling electronics others would never turn off. Wish it had Android support however I knew this going in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Schronce

customer_reviews.title: No Alexa integration
customer_reviews.text: These pretty much work as advertised, and are more affordable than many alternatives with the same functionality, but the lack of integration with Amazon Alexa or Google Home is a big negative.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Works good on 2 lamps to dim them
customer_reviews.text: Works good on 2 lamps to dim them. But on my Christmas tree I want to use the plug for just turning on and off from my phone and not dimming it. However, when I use my app to turn the Tree off, it’s goes into super dim mode and not completely off. Very strange that In power off mode there is still a little electricity supply the lights on the tree
customer_reviews.author: Kristi S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no difficult configuration
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as ordered. Works great, no difficult configuration, Plug into the wall, download the app and you're pretty much set. Only thing I wish was that I could control when not at home, but with all the other features I can live without this functionality.

customer_reviews.text: It requires having your location on at all times on your phone and doesn’t work well. Most of the time won’t control or dim the light

customer_reviews.title: FIX THE ZULI SERVER!
customer_reviews.text: ready to return if I continue to have problem with connecting to Zuli server. Been trying it for over a week and still can't. Yes, my WiFi is just fine and working. Device won't work because I can't program it. At this point it's nothing more but an expensive plug.

The other two are used on lamps in a living room and bedroom. This is a great product for anyone wanting to get into smart plug technology but also would make a great gift as the packaging on these plugs is very high end looking.

Contacted them several times and heard nothing. Vapor. Functions as a simple app controlled switch and that's it. Oh and if you happen to have an iPhone it's worthless too. My wife refused to use the presence feature because it ducked her battery dead in 3 hours. No wonder the 3 pack is selling for 1/3 the original price. They never fixed the issues and never delivered on promises. I'm very angry.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Provide Energy Savings
customer_reviews.text: These plugs are simple enough my mom, who just got a smart phone, was able to set them up. I like the fact they can integrate with any device in your home. They have allowed me to save energy by setting "larger" appliances that run when I am not home (i.e. cable box, internet router, etc) on schedules. I am excited to see the other ways I can save energy!

customer_reviews.title: Where to start...
customer_reviews.text: App is garbage for setup and login. You need to have location and Bluetooth on “always” in order to log in and it doesn’t tell you that, so you get frustrated (under statement) trying to log in. There is no “remote control” and no Alexa option. I bought this due to the price when it came up as “related” while looking at Alexa capable plugs. I guess that is amazons fault. Not Zuli. I can’t ask questions for this particular item for some reason but would like to know... Any remote control option soon? Alexa? Access adjustment?? Best part for me... the physical switch option where an outlet isn’t switched. 3 stars because it isn’t all on zuli

customer_reviews.title: haven't heard anything bad about it

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, works as advertised, but a complete battery drain.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product, it does work as advertised. The dark side of it is the complete drain of battery is has on iOS while having the presence feature enabled. I ended up using them as smart-electric-plug without the presence feature enabled. While I usually go a day and a half without charging my iPhone, I had to charge it twice with Zuli Presence enabled. I updated to the latest version, contacted their support, but still had the same problem.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Android is still in beta, no presence functionality, crashes often. HIRE AN ANDROID DEVELOPER!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first; now it's basically worthless
customer_reviews.text: Bought the three-pack; hooked everything up using Android Beta app with a Google Pixel. Was a little quirky to get operational at first, but ended up working just fine. Was very pleased with it. Got a new Google Pixel 2. Downloaded the app. Now two out of three plugs don't work: the app doesn't recognize them. I've jumped through all the usual hoops: unplug/re-plug; uninstall app/re-install app; etc. Nothing works. I've emailed customer service - no replies. I've seen questions on the Support page asking if they are still in business. No replies. A big disappointment. And of course, my return window with Amazon is closed...

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work reliably, even on IOS. I've had to pull it out of the plug to reset it several times. It stops working if my Internet goes down and I have to again take it out of the plug. Finally, I took it out of the plug to reset it, and it simply didn't work at all. Lasted 6 months, and didn't perform well when it did. Not a good purchase.....

customer_reviews.title: I want to return a Christmas gift.  POS...
customer_reviews.text: I received this from my wife as a Christmas present. It doesn’ work. At the manufacturer requested, email a help request. They robo- responded, they will contact me within 48 hour. That was 5 days ago. (I allowed time for the holiday). I WANT TO RETURN FOR CREDIT!

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: App was very well designed and I really enjoyed the entire process linking the plug to my various devices. The setup was simple and easy but the application of the product is nearly endless. I plan on buying more plugs as gifts for my friends and family, regardless of how tech savvy they are.

customer_reviews.text: Requires bluetooth / GPS always on, so it ironically uses more energy than it saves. Especially don't want to have location services on when at home because it's a huge data drain

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. I couldn't get the plugs set up or the Nest thermostat link. Just the symbol spinning constantly. App crashed over and over. I tried closing it, restarting my device, reinstalling the app. Love the concept. A bit to pricey to hang on to and wait for the interface to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Alison B.

product_meta.title: Zuli Smartplug: Smart Home Control, Dimmer, Energy Monitor & Timer (Individual)
product_meta.description:
Style:Individual

The only Smartplug that senses when you walk into a room and adapts the temperature and lights to your liking. Plug in your favorite lamps and appliances, and you get instant control from your iPhone. You can dim lights, set your space heater on a schedule, view your entire home’s energy use, and control your Nest Thermostat. With 3 or more Smartplugs, the Zuli Presence feature can accurately pin-point your location within the home. The Zuli app senses when you enter or exit a room and sets the lights and temperature — just the way you like them. No need to fumble for the lightswitch in the dark, no need to pull your phone out of your pocket every time. A smart home the way it should be — controlling your home has never been this beautiful. 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 


Your smart home on your phone Stay comfortable sitting on the couch, reading in bed — wherever you are in the house — while controlling your lights and appliances from the Zuli app. 

• Dial the perfect brightness — right from your iPhone. Zuli Smartplugs turn any lamp into a dimmer 
• Perfect for space heaters, fans, window air conditioners, air purifiers, or preheating the espresso machine 
• Zuli works with the Nest Thermostat — control your lights and thermostat from one simple app 

Be comfortable in every room of the house Zuli Presence senses when you enter or exit a room and notifies the Smartplugs to set the lights and temperature — just the way you like them. You don’t need to pull your phone out of your pocket, or fiddle with the light switch anymore. 

• Never walk into a dark room again — lights automatically turn on when you walk in 
• Saves you money by turning off unused lights and appliances when you’re not in the room 
• Notifies the Nest Thermostat as soon as you come home 
• Requires a minimum of 3 Zuli Smartplugs


Simple Scheduling Put your lights and appliances on a timer, and never think about them again. Have your lights turn on at sundown, or preheat your espresso machine.


See How Much You Saved See your energy usage at a glance — know what devices in the home are costing you the most. A smarter home means smarter choices.


Dial The Perfect Brightness Dial the brightness of every light as you would with a dimmer, even when it doesn't have one. Now you can always make sure the mood is just right.



Zuli Plays Well With Others Zuli works with Nest and Philips to create a more comfortable home. Connect Zuli Presence with your Nest Thermostat to set it to your preferred temperature as soon as you arrive home. Control overhead lights using Philips Hue within the Zuli app – so you can forget about ever using that lightswitch again. Simplified control means a more comfortable life. 

About the Startup 
Describe your product in 3 words.

Handsfree Smart Home

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

We lived in a shared house with other roommates and we got really tired of people leaving the TV and the lights on through the night. So we made some primitive prototypes and replaced our light switches and outlets — and we could control them from a smartphone. These simple prototypes would lay the foundation of what would soon become Zuli. 

What makes your product special?

We’re creating the future of how we interact with our homes. There’s no need to press a button, or to use a digital interface — your lights, your thermostat and other devices in the home just respond to your physical presence. Zuli can sense when you’re in the room, and when you’re away and learns your preferences — so you don’t have to worry about these things anymore. 

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

We started out with just 3 people who believed in bringing the handsfree connected home to life. Over the last 3 years, we have been fortunate enough to find other people who believe in the same vision, and are proud to have them a part of our team to build the future of technology in our homes.
feature_bullets: Control your lights and appliances from one beautiful app on your iPhone
Zuli works with the Nest Thermostat and Philips Hue – control both within the Zuli app
Set the perfect mood lighting right from your iPhone – Zuli turns any lamp into a dimmer
Zuli Presence knows when you're in a room and instantly sets the perfect lighting and temperature
View the energy usage of every light and appliance in your home – so you can make smarter choices
Zuli works with iPhone 4s, 5s, 6, 6+, 6s, 6s+ and iOS 7.1 or later
Rated at 1800W – the same as any North American outlet – so you can connect just about anything in your home

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.5 out of 5 stars212 ratings2.5 out of 5 stars
